amendment.description: To increase the limit on the value of assistance that may be provided to eligible entities to carry out procurement technical assistance programs operating on less than a Statewide basis.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1343 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1343 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allen. (consideration: CR S8738-8739; text: CR S8739) To increase the limit on the value of assistance that may be provided to eligible entities to carry out procurement technical assistance programs operating on less than a Statewide basis.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1343 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1343 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allen.
